name: The Only Way Is Up VR
name_original: The Only Way Is Up VR
description:
Description

The Only Way Is Up VR (or TOWIU) is a in progress VR experiment into climbing. You start at the bottom of a colossal wind turbine with nothing to do but climb up.

TOWIU was (what was meant to be at least) a 12 hour Game Jam entry on the theme of alternative/costal energy. I only had 5 hours to participate, however I implemented a custom climbing system based on the Unity XR packages helper classes, custom shader code and different types of grabbable objects.
